passives.name: Stellar Circle 5 Extension
passives.desc:
Stellar Circle 5 use +2

When using Stellar Circle 5:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 5; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Target: 5 turns Thief's Mark
 â€¢ MAX BRV Up becomes Thievery with moderate boost and moderate ATK boost
 â€¢ Slight SPD Down boostã€? moderate hit rate boost
 â€¢ Slight SPD Up boost
 â€¢ Granted buffã€? inflicted debuff duration +2 (Thief's Mark excluded)
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit

While Thievery active:
 â€¢ Stellar Circle 5 becomes Stellar Circle 5+ (deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Thief's Mark; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; triggers additional  PF attack after use)
passives.short_desc: Stellar Circle 5 Extension: Boost to Stellar Circle 5

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATKã€? SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATKã€? SPD

passives.name: Free Energy Extension
passives.desc:
Free Energy use +2

When using Free Energy:
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 â€¢ Target: 5 turns Thief's Mark
 â€¢ Self: 5 turns Thievery
 â€¢ Slight DEF Down boostã€? slight hit rate boost
 â€¢ Slight DEF Up boost

While Thievery active:
 â€¢ Free Energy becomes Free Energy+ (additional 2-hit melee  PG attack after multiplying BRV; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Thief's Mark)
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Thief's Mark)
passives.short_desc: Free Energy Extension: Boost to Free Energy
